Description: Shell of a marine gastropod mollusc of the Mediterranean 'Conus Mediterraneus' species.
Curator's comments: Found in box of unregistered shells with other shells that had handwritten slips written by Petrie identifying the shell species and naming Naukratis as the provenance. This shell was found with a note by Petrie: 'Conus Mediterraneus Medit. Nebireh (Naucratis) 1885'. Note various variants of Conus Mediterraneus.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (WC.23)
